name: Sugar Blast!
description:
Start playing Sugar Blast today! - Brand new candy blasting adventure!

A totally NEW game experience, Blast sweets, earn awesome rewards, and play tons of sugary levels for unlimited fun!

Features
– Super easy to play!
– Tap to pop groups of similarly colored candies.
– Combine lots of sweets to unleash powerful boosters.
– Candies fall according to physics, making every level unique!
– Master different types of challenges.
– Play hundreds of fun levels.

-----------------------------

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message!
Support@Rovio.Com
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sugarblastgame

-----------------------------
Sugar Blast is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available.
